magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch pattern instructions adult women s fitted beanie with an l 8 00mm hook mc chain 1 round 1 - double_crochet x 8 into mc pull to close tight and slip_stitch to first stitch to join 8 round 2 - ch1 2dc into each stitch around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 16 round 3 - ch1 double_crochet in same space as ch1 2dc into next stitch repeat double_crochet 2dc all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 24 round 4 - ch1 2dc in same space as ch1 double_crochet in the next 2 stitches repeat 2dc double_crochet double_crochet all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 32 round 5 - ch1 single_crochet in the same space as ch1 and in the next 2 stitches 2sc in next stitch repeat single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 2sc all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 40 round 6 - ch1 half_double_crochet in same space as ch1 and all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 40 rounds 7 - 14 - repeat round 6 for a total of 9 rounds of half_double_crochet s *you can make adjustments at this point to either add or remove an half_double_crochet round for a more personalized fit* last round - ch1 single_crochet all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join finish off and weave in ends **note to make a smaller beanie to fit small adult/teen/large child you can down size your hook to a k 6 50mm hook and follow the pattern above you ll just need to adjust the height of the hat by removing enough half_double_crochet rounds from rounds 6 through 14 to get the right fit ** adult men s fitted beanie with a k 6 50mm hook mc chain 1 round 1 -
